DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effectiveness South Beach Diet product compare American Diabetic Association Diabetes Meal Plan .
DOC.brief_title: Effect South Beach Diet ( SBD™ ) Using SBD™ Products Compared American Diabetic Association ( ADA ) Diabetes Meal Plan Body Weight Satiety Diabetic Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female age 18 55 year 2 . Females childbearing potential must agree use medically approve method birth control negative urine pregnancy test result 3 . Healthy determine laboratory result medical history 4 . Waist circumference > 87 cm 5 . Stable weight define < 4.5 kg gain lose past year 6 . Agreement maintain current level physical activity throughout study 7 . Diagnosed Type II diabetes mellitus fast blood glucose 100 250 mg/dl ( 5.6 13.9 mmol/L ) 8 . Ability comprehend complete questionnaire form 9 . Agreement comply study procedure , test article consumption , access microwave oven 10 . Voluntary , write , inform consent participate study 1 . Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant course trial 2 . Use prescription counter product know effect weight include limited following : megestrol acetate ; somatropin ; sibutramine ; orlistat ; paroxetine ; dextroamphetamine ; methylphenidate ; atomoxetine ; quetiapine ; olanzepine ; risperidone , within 4 week randomization trial 3 . Unstable medication diabetes mellitus ( Dosage must stable 90 day prior randomization ) , use insulin exclusionary 4 . Alcohol use > 2 standard alcoholic drink per day 5 . Significant cardiac history define history : myocardial infarction ( MI ) ; coronary angioplasty bypass graft ( ) ; valvular disease repair ; unstable angina pectoris ; transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) ; cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) ; congestive heart failure ; coronary artery disease ( CAD ) 6 . History current diagnosis cancer ( except successfully treat basal cell carcinoma ) diagnose less 5 year prior screen . Subjects cancer full remission 5 year acceptable . 7 . Uncontrolled hypertension define untreated systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg 8 . Unstable renal and/or liver disease 9 . History alcohol drug abuse within past year 10 . Unstable psychiatric disorder require hospitalization within past 6 month 11 . Immunocompromised individual subject undergo organ transplantation subject diagnose human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) 12 . History hemoglobinopathy sickle cell anemia thalassemia , sideroblastic anemia 13 . Participation another clinical research trial within 30 day prior randomization trial 14 . Significant abnormal liver function define AST and/or ALT > 2 x ULN , and/or bilirubin > 2 x ULN 15 . Serum creatinine > 125 umol/L 16 . Anemia etiology define hemoglobin < 110 g/L 17 . Uncontrolled and/or untreated thyroid disorder 18 . Unstable medication ( Dosage must stable 90 day prior randomization ) 19 . History food allergy sensitivity , include lactose intolerance 20 . Vegetarians 21 . Cognitively impaired and/or unable give inform consent 22 . Any condition Investigator 's opinion may adversely affect subject 's ability complete study measure may pose significant risk subject
